I ara directed by H« 1.1 • Chief Inspector to attach a draft Appendix to a revised edition of General Instructions to Immigration Officers which contains - inter/alia a list of territories for which the Secretary of State for India was responsible. M. Government in the Dominions. I am. Sir, The Under Secretary of State, External Department, Division B, Commonwealth Relations Office, Downing Street, S. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 216/48 'Revision of General Instructions to Immigration Officers (list of territories)'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding revisions to the list of Protectorates and Mandated Territories that are the respective responsibilities of the Colonial Office, Commonwealth Relations Office, Foreign Office and India Office, for inclusion in a new edition of the General Instructions to Immigration Officers. The primary correspondents are: Home Office; Commonwealth Relations Office.
